entities.name: IOT
entities.description: The Internet of Things (IoT) involves a network of distributed and interconnected devices employing sensors, data, and computing capabilities including AI.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a technology company developing products, services, and technologies to support the growth of the intelligent cloud and intelligent edge. They are also integrating AI into many of their offerings.

entities.name: BING
entities.description: Bing is a search engine service provided by Microsoft.

entities.name: AZURE
entities.description: Azure is a cloud computing service created by Microsoft.

entities.name: MICROSOFT ACCOUNT SERVICES
entities.description: Microsoft Account services provide identity and access management services for Microsoft users.

entities.name: MICROSOFT 365
entities.description: Microsoft 365 is a suite of productivity applications and cloud-based services offered by Microsoft.

entities.name: MICROSOFT TEAMS
entities.description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that integrates with Microsoft 365.

entities.name: DYNAMICS 365
entities.description: Dynamics 365 is a set of intelligent business applications offered by Microsoft.

entities.name: ONEDRIVE
entities.description: OneDrive is a cloud storage service provided by Microsoft.

entities.name: SHAREPOINT ONLINE
entities.description: SharePoint Online is a cloud-based service for collaboration and document management, offered by Microsoft.

entities.name: SKYPE
entities.description: Skype is a telecommunications application that provides video chat and voice call services, owned by Microsoft.

entities.name: XBOX
entities.description: Xbox is a video gaming brand created and owned by Microsoft.

entities.name: OUTLOOK.COM
entities.description: Outlook.com is a web-based suite of webmail, contacts, tasks, and calendaring services from Microsoft.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft is developing products, services, and technologies to support the growth of IoT.
Bing is a search engine service provided by Microsoft.
Azure is a cloud computing service created by Microsoft.
Microsoft Account services provide identity and access management services for Microsoft users.
Microsoft 365 is a suite of productivity applications and cloud-based services offered by Microsoft.
Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that integrates with Microsoft 365.
Dynamics 365 is a set of intelligent business applications offered by Microsoft.
OneDrive is a cloud storage service provided by Microsoft.
SharePoint Online is a cloud-based service for collaboration and document management, offered by Microsoft.
Skype is a telecommunications application that provides video chat and voice call services, owned by Microsoft.
Xbox is a video gaming brand created and owned by Microsoft.
Outlook.com is a web-based suite of webmail, contacts, tasks, and calendaring services from Microsoft.
